title.rendered: Walls of Books Coming Soon to Tifton, GA

content.rendered:
What other retail jobs can be so enjoyable? So fulfilling? I can’t think of many. We are allowed to sell books while promoting literacy, education, and cultural diversity. It’s rewarding, to say the least.

My joy will come when the Tifton store opens its doors for the first time. The sign above the door that says “Walls of Books” will be an incredible sight. We will realize a dream. It’s been a wonderful ride… going from one 1500 sf store in Warner Robins, Georgia to six locations across the Southeast. Then, six months ago, we made that decision to franchise… and we hope to see Walls of Books stores open in all fifty states. Now, we get to bring others along for this ride.
